snippet: Retailers from around the world are adding some notable spaces to the avenue south of 49th Street.
abstract: Retailers are expanding south of 49th Street along New York City's Fifth Avenue, a stretch long overshadowed by shops further north; the opening of several flagship stores by retailers from around the world is a result of limited available space and an effort to expand the shopping destination brand among tourists and locals that is Fifth Avenue.
lead_paragraph: Retailers from around the world are adding some notable spaces to the avenue south of 49th Street.

headline.seo: The Heart of Fifth Avenue Shopping Edges to the South
headline.main: The Heart of Fifth Avenue Shopping Is Edging to the South
headline.print_headline: The Heart of Fifth Avenue Shopping Is Edging to the South
